settings.content: Third-party apps and add-ons can sometimes require a full page refresh. If your app is not displaying properly, select Sport mode.

settings.label: Enable styled tables
settings.info: This will add borders and padding to your tables

settings.label: Enable solid menu background color
settings.info: This will enable a solid header over the banner images

settings.label: Enable menu background transparency
settings.info: This will make the sticky menu semi-transparent throughout the shop

settings.label: Stretch background to fill the password page

settings.content: Select the number of custom mega menus to enable ([?](https://help.outofthesandbox.com/hc/en-us/articles/115008690607))
After enabling reviews you will need to install the free [Shopify Product Reviews](https://apps.shopify.com/product-reviews) app.

settings.label: Display star rating on product listings
Display star rating on product page
Mini cart checkout
settings.info: Proceed to checkout from the mini cart

settings.label: Shipping rates calculator default country selection

settings.content: If your customer is logged-in, the country in his default shipping address will be selected. If you are not sure about the spelling to use above, refer to your first checkout page.

settings.label: Enable currency conversion
settings.info: Even though prices are displayed in different currencies, orders will still be processed in your store's currency.

settings.label: Supported currencies
settings.default: USD CAD INR GBP AUD EUR JPY
settings.info: Use the country's ISO [currency code](http://www.xe.com/iso4217.php). Separate your currency codes with a space.

settings.label: Show newsletter form above footer
settings.info: Home page newsletter can be added as a section.

settings.content: To test the popup feature, set the number of days until the popup is displayed again to Test Mode.

settings.label: First button link
settings.info: Leave blank for a close button

settings.label: Second button link
settings.info: Leave blank for a close button

settings.label: Days until popup is displayed again
